summary: "True Detective," an HBO crime drama, first aired in 2014. The season focuses on detectives Rustin Cohle (Matthew McConaughey) and Martin Hart (Woody Harrelson) investigating a murder in Louisiana. The story moves between 1995 and present day. Hart's personal life causes problems, and Cohle deals with a troubled past. They reopen the case years later when more murders occur. The show is known for its complex story and themes, and it won many awards for its writing, acting, and directing.
title: True Detective season 1
